Title: Plane Presentation Framework
Description: This aim of the project was to write a framework that provides all the common underpinning needed for demonstrating pixel manipulation effects, via GDI or DirectDraw, under a managed context in a Microsoft Windows environment.
HomeWiki:
Project Description
This aim of this project was to write a framework which provides all the common underpinning needed for demonstrating pixel manipulation effects, via GDI or DirectDraw, under a managed context in a Microsoft Windows environment.

Render Simple
Starfield
Gradients
Fire
